title: The Sound of Violence
lyrics:
You can't ignore us
We won't relent
Suffer
In your descent
Now bow before us
In silence

And hear our voice

The sound of violence



We the worthless

Claim your birthright

Your oppression

This war we invite



You can't ignore us

You will lament

Suffer

Lest you repent

Inhale your poison

In silence

A broken throne

The sound of violence



We all know

What you really are

Your legacy

Will be buried in the dirt



Behind the lies

You are the prey

And for your sins

You will suffer with us

Behind the lies

You are the prey

And for your sins

You will suffer with us
